title: Mother
body:
Hello hard fellow.
<<if !visited("Mother.AskForMilk")>>
    [[Mother.AskForMilk]]
<<else>>
    <<if !visited("Farmer.GiveMilk")>>
        My child still doesn't feel better,
        could you get some Milk from the farmer living east of here?
    <<else>>
        [[Mother.TakeMilk]]
    <<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: Mother.AskForMilk
body:
My child is hungry.
Usually I feed them with fresh milk by the farmer.
So if you could go over there and get some...
It'd be a huge help for me.
He lives just east of here.
Also say hi to emma by me.

title: Mother.TakeMilk
body:
<<if !visited("Mother.TakeMilk")>>
    I see you brought us the milk.
    My child and me really appreciate that.
    Could you give us a bit of privacy now?
<<else>>
    Thank you for that milk earlier,
    but we need some rest now.
    So if you could leave us alone?
<<endif>>
